tasks.label: start docker postgres container
tasks.command: docker run --name some-postgres -v D:/home/express-test-server-v.2/db/:/app -p 6666:5555 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=yourpassword -e POSTGRES_DB=dockerdatabase -d postgres

tasks.label: build postgres tables
tasks.command: docker exec some-postgres sh -c 'psql -U postgres -d dockerdatabase < /app/initial.sql'
